SEARCH
Package Entity.Users

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Entity.Users.User
Entity.Users.Student
public class Student extends User
Represents a student user in the Internship Placement Management System. Students can view and apply for internship opportunities based on their year of study and major. Year 1-2 students can only apply for Basic level internships, while Year 3-4 can apply for any level. Students can accept at most one internship placement.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String userID, String name, String email, List<String> majors, int year, boolean hasAcceptedInternshipOpportunity)
      Constructs a Student with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      userID - the unique student ID (format: U followed by 7 digits and a letter, e.g., U2345123F)
      name - the full name of the student
      email - the student's email address
      majors - the list of major codes the student is enrolled in
      year - the current year of study (1-4)
      hasAcceptedInternshipOpportunity - whether the student has already accepted an internship

  • Method Details

    • setAcceptanceStatusToTrue

      public void setAcceptanceStatusToTrue()
      Sets the acceptance status to true when student accepts an internship offer.

    • setAcceptanceStatusToFalse

      public void setAcceptanceStatusToFalse()
      Sets the acceptance status to false (e.g., when internship is cancelled or withdrawn).

    • getAcceptanceStatus

      public boolean getAcceptanceStatus()
      Checks whether the student has accepted an internship opportunity.
      Returns:
      true if student has accepted an internship, false otherwise

    • getMajors

      public List<String> getMajors()
      Gets the list of majors the student is enrolled in.
      Returns:
      a list of major codes (e.g., ["CSC", "EEE"])

    • getYear

      public int getYear()
      Gets the student's current year of study.
      Returns:
